issueSolutions.solutionText: Install friction discs from 2020 MY
Rekluse RMS-4813

Install friction discs from bikes below: 
 Polaris Outlaw 500 ATV (2006 - 2007) 
 Polaris Predator 500 ATV (2003 - 2007) 
 Kawasaki KFX400 (2003 - 2006) 
 Kawasaki KX450F (2006 - 2014) 
 Kawasaki KX250F (2004 - 2014) 
 Kawasaki KFX450 (2008 - 2012) 
 Kawasaki KFX400 (2003 - 2006) 
 Suzuki DRZ 400 (2000 - 2012) 
 Suzuki LT-Z400 ATV (2012 - 2013) 
 Arctic Cat DVX400 ATV 2004-2008 
 Honda CRF450R (2002-2014) 
 Honda CRF450X (2005-2009) 
 Honda CRF450X (2012-2013) 
 Honda CR250R (1997-2007) 
 Honda CR500 AF/R (1990-2007) 
 Honda TRX450 (2004-2009) 
 Honda TRX450 (2013-2014)

For 300m altitude: 
 30 
 170 
 N8RE 

 *You also may try to tune by KTM/Husqvarna manual for your engine volume
